title.rendered: Work Continues at Orlando International Airport

content.rendered:
The future of Orlando International Airport is really starting to take shape. Alticor Inc’ scope of the program includes a 2,400-car parking garage, the South Airport Automated People Mover (APM) Complex, renovation of the APM station in the North Terminal, completion of the APM guideway structure to the South Airport APM Complex station, modifications to APM guideway structures, roadways, bridges, site work, and all associated infrastructure.

Recent milestones include the completion of foundations for the ITF/APM and parking garage, along with the commencement of underground coordination at the Central Energy Plant. Upcoming activities include structural steel operations, elevated work, and the completion of underground utilities.

excerpt.rendered: The future of Orlando International Airport is really starting to take shape. Recent milestones include the completion of foundations for the ITF/APM and parking garage, along with the commencement of underground coordination at the Central Energy Plant.
